tasks.task: Perform trenching for sprinkler system installation
subtasks: Mark trench locations using spray paint or flags
Check with local authorities for required materials
Dig trenches to appropriate depth (6-8 inches) and ensure flat bottom
Assemble pipes outside trench to avoid bending or kinking
Apply primer and cement to pipe sections
Connect pipes using appropriate fittings (e.g., T's, swing joints)
Backfill trenches, being cautious not to hit pipes with shovels
Determine depth for sprinkler head placement (level with ground)
Connect sprinkler heads to pipes using quick-connect components
Adjust sprinkler heads for correct direction and coverage
Install nozzles (adjustable and rotary) suited to specific water needs
Ensure proper spacing between heads for efficient coverage
